message.raw:
* Enable TRIGSYNC so that both channels receive hardware trigger on pin3 of DB15
* Attempt ot enable synchronous table mode i.e. TABLE,SYNC (intermittently works)
* Disabled automatic TABLE,RESTART owing to non-deterministic results in testing
* Ditto for TABLE,REARM on CH1 (whereas TABLE,REARM must be enabled on ch2)
* Removed unused generic communication methods (ask_dict, set_get, stt_timeout)
* Removed specific comms methods (parse_response, get_val, set_val, program_static)
* In program_manual, only call STOP/START on ch1
* Made smart-programming equality check more concise
* In parse_entry (used by check_remote_values), removed magic number in place of
  freq_conv.MHz_to_base.
* Populatd shutdown method of Worker with self.close()

• Enable TRIGSYNC so that both channels receive hardware trigger on pin3 of DB15
  • Attempt ot enable synchronous table mode i.e. TABLE,SYNC (intermittently works)
  • Disabled automatic TABLE,RESTART owing to non-deterministic results in testing
  • Ditto for TABLE,REARM on CH1 (whereas TABLE,REARM must be enabled on ch2)
  • Removed unused generic communication methods (ask_dict, set_get, stt_timeout)
  • Removed specific comms methods (parse_response, get_val, set_val, program_static)
  • In program_manual, only call STOP/START on ch1
  • Made smart-programming equality check more concise
  • In parse_entry (used by check_remote_values), removed magic number in place of
    freq_conv.MHz_to_base.
  • Populatd shutdown method of Worker with self.close()

message:
* Enable TRIGSYNC so that both channels receive hardware trigger on pin3 of DB15
* Attempt ot enable synchronous table mode i.e. TABLE,SYNC (intermittently works)
* Disabled automatic TABLE,RESTART owing to non-deterministic results in testing
* Ditto for TABLE,REARM on CH1 (whereas TABLE,REARM must be enabled on ch2)
* Removed unused generic communication methods (ask_dict, set_get, stt_timeout)
* Removed specific comms methods (parse_response, get_val, set_val, program_static)
* In program_manual, only call STOP/START on ch1
* Made smart-programming equality check more concise
* In parse_entry (used by check_remote_values), removed magic number in place of
  freq_conv.MHz_to_base.
* Populatd shutdown method of Worker with self.close()
